attributes.action: Let us have an extra day at the weekend and call it 'easyday'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The weekend is far to small, consisting of only 2 days. I have difficulty relaxing on Sunday knowing I have a whole week of work ahead of me. I suggest a day between Saturday and Sunday called 'Easyday' This can be a day of relaxing or social fulfilment that can only benefit Great Britain PLC.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
